comments: I\'ve never had any problem with doing my work or showing up to class having read the material, but he makes it an absolute chore and overloads you with content. His lectures are ripe with grammatical errors and he simply reads off the slide. He assigns you more homework/lectures than a full time/in person class would even in a condensed setting.

comments: Professor Menkhus gives you just enough rope to hang yourself. He expects a lot out of you, but allows you to work at your own pace. Fun class, but A LOT of work.
